General.Name: Bluebird Merchant Ventures Ltd
General.Description: Bluebird Merchant Ventures Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in mining and developing of mineral properties. The company primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. It holds interests in the Gubong project and Kochang project located in South Korea. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Road Town, the British Virgin Islands.
General.Address: Harney Westwood & Riegels, Road Town, British Virgin Islands, VG1110
